newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Railroad industry cut by Gruntal.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Railroad industry cut by Gruntal.

text.p: -- Gruntal & Co Inc Analyst Steve Lewins cut ratings of companies in the railroad industry, citing a weakened monetary and interest rate environment. He noted the strong U.S. dollar, which can cut the export component of the U.S. Gross Domestic Product, the recent rise in the federal funds rate, and the yield on the 30-year U.S. Treasury bond which has risen above seven percent.

-- Lewins said he cut a number of ratings to lock in capital gains. The adjustments "are prudent, even if just temporary, because of the sensitivity of the stocks ... to monetary policy," he said in a statement.
-- APL Limited to neutral from outperform speculative. Shares rose 1/8 to 21-1/8 at midday.
-- Burlington Northern Santa Fe Corp to outperform speculative from outperform. Shares off 2 to 72.
-- CSX Corp to outperform long-term from outperform. CSX off 3/8 to 46-1/8.
-- Kansas City Southern to outperform speculative from outperform long term. shares up 1/8 to 50-1/8.
-- Illinois Central Corp to neutral from outperform long-term. shares up 1/2 to 32.
-- Norfolk Southern Corp to outperform long term from outperform. Shares up 1 to 86-1/4.
-- Union Pacific Corp to outperform long-term from outperform. Shares off 1/4 to 56-1/2.
